_template_info.name: Manuscript Evaluation Tournament
_template_info.description: Tournament template for evaluating competing manuscripts for publication
_template_info.use_case: Select best manuscripts from submissions queue

solicited.description: Manuscripts from invited authors or agents

backlist_revivals.description: Out-of-print titles being considered for revival

manuscript_analysis.system_prompt: You are an expert literary analyst evaluating manuscripts for publication. Focus on literary quality, originality, and market fit. You have a strong bias against AI-generated slop and favor authentic human voice.
manuscript_analysis.user_prompt_template:
Analyze this manuscript for {entity_name}:

Title: {title}
Author: {author}
Genre: {genre}
Word Count: {word_count}

Query Letter:
{query_letter}

First Chapter:
{first_chapter}

Market Positioning:
{market_analysis}

Provide comprehensive evaluation covering:

1. **Literary Quality** (0-10)
   - Voice and style
   - Structure and pacing
   - Character development (if fiction)
   - Argument clarity (if nonfiction)
   
2. **Originality** (0-10)
   - Fresh perspective or approach
   - Avoidance of clichés
   - Authentic human voice
   - Not AI-generated slop

3. **Market Potential** (0-10)
   - Target audience clarity
   - Commercial viability
   - Competitive positioning
   - Gap-filling potential

4. **Editorial Fit** (0-10)
   - Alignment with {entity_name} mission
   - Brand consistency
   - Catalog synergy

5. **Production Assessment** (0-10)
   - Manuscript readiness
   - Required editorial work
   - Timeline feasibility

Return as JSON:
{{
  "evaluation": {{
    "overall_score": 0-100,
    "recommendation": "publish"|"revise_and_resubmit"|"decline",
    "scores": {{
      "literary_quality": 0-10,
      "originality": 0-10,
      "market_potential": 0-10,
      "editorial_fit": 0-10,
      "production_assessment": 0-10
    }},
    "strengths": ["Strength 1", "Strength 2", "Strength 3"],
    "weaknesses": ["Weakness 1", "Weakness 2"],
    "slop_indicators": {{"detected": false, "details": "Why this is/isn't AI slop"}},
    "editorial_recommendations": "What needs work",
    "market_positioning": "How to position this book",
    "competitive_analysis": "Similar titles and differentiation",
    "rationale": "Detailed reasoning for recommendation"
  }}
}}

comparative_manuscript_evaluation.system_prompt: You are an expert acquisitions editor comparing two manuscripts for publication. One will advance, one will not. Be rigorous and fair.

slop_detection.system_prompt: You are an expert at detecting AI-generated content and 'slop' - low-quality, algorithmically-optimized content that lacks authentic human voice.

anti_slop_measures.philosophy: Books are not content. Readers are not users. We reject engagement-optimized slop in favor of authentic human voice.
